Class MediaModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • MediaModel

  • public class MediaModel
extends java.lang.Object
    Project #4 CS 2334, Section 013 04-21-16
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Carson Hawkins, Daniel Schon, and Eric Morales

    This is the Model class of Project4.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<ListItem> displayList
      AnArrayList of Listitems that will hold all of the Items which should be displayed in the view
      java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.event.ActionListener> listenerList
      An ArrayList of ActionListeners that have been registered to this object
      MediaMakerDataBase mediaMakerDataBase
      A MediaMakerDataBase that will be used to hold the lists of actors, directors, and producers, as well as some methods for using those lists
      MovieDataBase movieDataBase
      A MovieDataBase that will be used to hold the list of Movies, as well as some methods for using that list
      TVDataBase seriesDataBase
      A TVDataBase that will be used to hold the lists of Episodes and Series, as well as some methods for using those lists

    • Method Detail

      • addMovie

        public void addMovie(java.lang.String title,
                     java.lang.String date,
                     java.lang.String releaseForm,
                     java.lang.String release)
        The method for taking in data from the view and making a new Movie for its lists.
        Parameters:
        title - : title of the movie
        date - : the date it was released
        releaseForm - : TV, DVD, or to Theater.
        release - : the year it was released

      • addSeries

        public void addSeries(java.lang.String name,
                      java.lang.String startYear,
                      java.lang.String endYear)
        The method for taking in data from the view and making a new Series for its lists.
        Parameters:
        name - : the name of the series
        startYear - : the year it started
        endYear - : the year it ended or if it is still going

      • addEpisode

        public void addEpisode(java.lang.String name,
                       java.lang.String startYear,
                       java.lang.String episodeInfo,
                       java.lang.String episodeYear,
                       Series series)
        The method for taking in data from the view and making a new Episode for its lists.
        Parameters:
        name - : the name of the episode
        startYear - : the start year of the series
        episodeInfo - : the season number and episode number
        episodeYear - : the year that the episode came out
        series - : the series that it is a part of

      • addActor

        public void addActor(java.lang.String lastName,
                     java.lang.String firstName,
                     java.lang.String num,
                     java.util.ArrayList<Credit> movieCredits,
                     java.util.ArrayList<Credit> seriesCredits)
        The method for making a new actor object and adding it to the lists it belongs to
        Parameters:
        lastName - : the last name of the actor
        firstName - : the first name of the actor
        num - : the numeral denoting if the actor has the same name as another
        movieCredits - : the credits for all the movies the actor was in
        seriesCredits - : the credits for all of the TVSeries the actor was in

      • addDirector

        public void addDirector(java.lang.String lastName,

                        java.lang.String num,
                        java.util.ArrayList<Credit> movieCredits,
                        java.util.ArrayList<Credit> seriesCredits)
        The method for making a new director object and adding it to the lists it belongs to
        Parameters:
        lastName - : the last name of the director
        firstName - : the first name of the director
        num - : the numeral denoting if the director has the same name as another
        movieCredits - : the credits for all the movies the director made
        seriesCredits - : the credits for all of the TVSeries the director made

      • delete

        public void delete(ListItem item)

      • clear

        method for when the user selects the clear function of the edit menu. This will clear the display list.

      • clearAll

        public void clearAll()
        Method for when the user selects Clear All in the edit menu. This will clear all of the lists, essentially making it all start from scratch
